case_title: United States of America v. Perkins
case_info_full_case_name: United States of America v. Perkins

charges.charge_description: 18:2113(a) and (d): BANK ROBBERY, ASSAULT WITH A DEADLY WEAPON and 18:2: AIDING AND ABETTING; and FORFEITURE(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Dft sentenced to be imprisoned for a term of fifty-one (51) months; serve two (2) years supervised release; pay $9,518.00 restitution; and to pay $100 special assessment. The term of imprisonment is to run concurrently with any remaining undischarged term in Count One (1) in related case 1-14CR35.
